amendatorysection.catchline: Clerk of the district court; nonperformance of duties; removal from office.
amendatorysection.para: Any clerk of the district court who fails to perform his or her duties under sections 42-358 to 42-358.07 or the Income Withholding for Child Support Act shall be removed from office after conviction for such offense.

crossreference.para: Income Withholding for Child Support Act, see section 43-1701.
